Question: Do you require the application to support Multi-Language?
Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus is available in more than 20 Languages. Refer the below links to know more about the Supported Languages both in On-Premises & in On-Demand Versions. https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/localized-versions.html https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/supported-languages.html

Question: Do you require Enterprise Service Management?
Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus supports Enterprise Service Management - which allows multiple helpdesk instances like IT, HR, Finance, etc. to be created/configured under 1 organization account. Each instance can have its own technicians, workflows, templates, etc. & are licensed separately which includes Technicians, Editions, Add-ons, etc.  For Cloud version you can have max 10 instances. Refer the below link to know more about the same. https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/enterprise-service-desk-management.html

No.Question: Which edition of ServiceDesk Plus Cloud do you need?
No.Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus is available in 3 editions as Standard, Professional & Enterprise. Refer the below link to know more about the differences between the editions. https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/sdp-editions.html

No.Question: Number of Technicians required?
No.Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus is licensed based on the number of 'Named Technicians' who needs access to the application for managing the Tickets, Assets, Problem, Change, CMDB, Purchase, Contracts, Reports, etc. There is no licensing/limitation on the number of users who can Report an Issue or Request for Service.

No.Question: Number of Nodes
No.Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus is also licensed based on the total number of Nodes/Assets. ServiceDesk Plus supports adding assets under 2 categories as IT Asset & as Non IT Assets. All assets added under IT Asset Category either by scanning the network or by adding through CSV file or by adding manually using the New Asset Addition form will be considered as Node & for licensing. Assets can also be added under Non IT Asset Category through CSV or using the form where Scanning is not supported & there is no license required for Non IT Assets.

No.Question: Project Management
No.Explanation:
You can learn more about the Project Management Add-on from the below link. 
 https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/itsm/it-project-management-tracking-software.html

No.Question: No. of Remote Control Concurrent Sessions
No.Explanation: Applicable only for Professional & Enterprise editions. ServiceDesk Plus Technicians can control the users workstation using this add-on. Please specify the number of concurrent sessions you might require.

No.Question: No. of Live Chat Agents
No.Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus can enable the Live Chat between Users & Technicians using this option. Please specify the number of technicians to whom you would like to enable this option.

Yes.Question: Which edition of ServiceDesk Plus Cloud do you need?
Yes.Explanation: ServiceDesk Plus is available in 3 editions as Standard, Professional & Enterprise. Refer the below link to know more about the differences between the editions. https://www.manageengine.com/products/service-desk/sdp-editions.html

Question: Subscription Type
Explanation: Monthly Subscription: Applicable only for ServiceDesk Plus On-Cloud. It includes License Fee & Support Fee for the subscribed period to keep the product up & running. Annual Subscription: It includes License Fee & Support Fee for 1 year & the same has to be renewed for the next year to keep the product up & running.

Annual Subscription.Question: Number of Years
Annual Subscription.Explanation: Please specify the number of years for which you would like to subscribe the product.
